name: namelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without a name, or with a name that is not known or shown: I don't like critics who keep themselves hidden namelessly on the internet. The film was introduced with a short trailer that appeared mysteriously and namelessly in cinemas.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was buried namelessly in an unmarked grave.The data is presented namelessly so that it remains anonymous.A number of statues stood namelessly in the courtyard.The road forked namelessly and I was unsure which branch I should take.
